thread.title: Lovely location with gracious staff
thread.title_full: Lovely location with gracious staff - Review of Terrass'' Hotel by MH, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: SABRINA S
title: Lovely location with gracious staff
text:
The room was nice sized & clean. I found the staff was quite helpful & very kind. The only negative was I read breakfast was 12 euro, but was charged 25 per person, though it is a lovely view from the window it is not worth the price for the food. Also spa & dinner reservations must me made more in advance then suspected which would've been nice to have a tip about when initially checking in as I found the host of the restaurant to be quite short & curt. I loved the location of this hotel & was overall very pleased with my stay. I would gladly stay again on a future trip!
Room Tip: Worth the slight increase of cost for the Eiffel Tower view as I enjoyed the view of the old cemeter... See more room tips
